name: Europixel Song Contest
description:
Help Edmund remember the words of his song!

Edmund and his band have joined the Europixel Song Contest, but Edmund has a really bad memory. You must connect his thoughts to the correct word, for any chance of winning the ESC.

Click and hold the mouse button over the correct item and Edmund's brain cell will start moving. Let go when the cell is on top of the item to make the connection. You have 3 tries on each rhyme, and there are 7 levels with increasing difficulty  to play before you see which place you get.

Break a leg!

(The game is quite hard. There might be a later update with more difficulty levels. That being said, the creator has achieved several 1st places. :) )

---

This game was made by 2 people: PixelBerntsen (programming, graphics) and Response (music, sound). We are both old school guys who appreciate big pixels and blip blop sounds.

Game made with Unity, Photoshop, Twisted Wave, FL Studio.
